doc.title: Another Day Another Life
doc.plot: Another day Another life is a man's tryst with his destiny in these tumultuous economic times. For a young man in New York City, his job, his investments, his dwelling and most importantly his love is what keeps him going until the day he loses all of them. His rage to react and his yearning to salvage his love are so conflicted that he reacts in the most conventional fashion. But, what if that conflict itself rescues him from the brink of disaster?
